tool_description: Generates movement paths and trajectories from GPS coordinates, calculating distances, bearings, and movement patterns.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data points: Need at least 2 GPS fixes to generate movement paths.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude values must be -90 to 90, longitude values must be -180 to 180.
Timestamp sequence error: Timestamps must be in chronological order.
usage: Provide equal-length arrays of timestamps, latitudes, and longitudes with at least 2 points. The tool calculates step lengths, bearings, and cumulative distances.

step_lengths_km.description: Distance between consecutive GPS fixes in kilometers

bearings_degrees.description: Bearing angles between consecutive fixes in degrees

cumulative_distance_km.description: Total cumulative distance traveled in kilometers

movement_summary.description: Summary of movement characteristics and patterns
